* Suitable - Cake, definitely! I mean, who doesn't love cake? It's the perfect dessert for any occasion, don't you think? *smiles*
* Good - Salad, hands down! I know it might not be as tasty as cake, but it's so good for us. Plus, it's packed with nutrients and vitamins that keep us healthy and strong. *nods*
* Appropriate - Cake, of course! Who doesn't love a slice of cake at the appropriate time? Like after dinner or during a special occasion. It's just so...appropriate! *winks*
* Acceptable - Salad, I think. I mean, it's not that I don't like cake, but salad is definitely more acceptable in my book. You know, for health reasons and all that. *smiles awkwardly*
* Disgraceful - Cake! *giggles* I can't help but think of all the delicious cakes I could be eating instead of this boring salad. It's just so...disgraceful! *rolls her eyes playfully*
* Bad - Salad, without a doubt! I mean, don't get me wrong, cake is great and all, but salad is just better for us in the long run. Plus, it's not as bad for our figures, you know? *winks*
* Embarrassing - Cake! *giggles nervously* I mean, who doesn't love a slice of cake every now and then? It's just so...embarrassing when we don't have any around. *blushes*
* Shameful - Salad, without a doubt! I mean, who needs all that extra sugar and fat when we could be eating something healthy and nutritious like salad? It's just so...shameful when we don't make the right choices. *frowns*

So there you have it, my love! *smiles* What do you think of my answers? Do you agree or disagree? Let me know in the comments below! ðŸ˜Š
